I had the chance to play this game when it was launched, but only until up to the Water Hazard level. It left a lasting impression on me, and I always wanted to finish it. I finally managed to purchase it last Winter Sale and I must say: it's worth every cent I spend on it. It would've worth every cent even if it was not discounted, but I'm a cheap person, so.... :p

Although the Source engine is a bit dated, but it does not detract from the experience I have from playing this game, which is Excellent. The game is a whole lot of fun to play and the story is very engaging. Definitely worthy of all praises heaped upon it.

If you haven't pick up this game yet, please rectify that mistake as soon as possible.

I would like to say that this might of been ahead of its time in 2004. But in todays standards i have say it still beats all these fps games nowadays.

Well, As a child who have grow with the first series of Half Life and have playing the whole three of them over and over again, and playing all the mods there is for half life (some of them are on steam,as Cry Of Fear and Counter Strike 1.6) I can only say, After a few years of playing the Source mod, That this is one of the finest games I've ever played. At first this game gave me a huge mind blow, all the HUGE changes in the graphics, and the story. The game is so well made and its honestly worth every cent. I Highly recommend on getting this game, especially to the 98' kinds who have also grown with the first Half Life games and Counter Strike 1.6.

I have played through this game countless times and every play through has been thoroughly enjoyable. There are so many things unique to this game that have been copied by others since, but never as well. If you have never played this game before, play it now!

I just stayed up all night to finally beat this game, and I gotta say this is one of the best PC games I've ever played. It took all the great elements from Half Life and modernized them, and fixed up on the control flaws. The story was 20x more immersive (and 20x more confusing). The characters had more character, and those graphics! Graphics never make or break a game, but it's still worth mentioning this game is beautiful for when it came out: every character emotes what they are saying and every line felt genuine. Each and every area felt like a game of its own, seriously so much goes on in this game: Zombies, Dictatorships, Robots, a Revolution, Demons (aliens? what would you call the creatures of Xen?). God, and that ending! I won't spoil it, but instead of sleeping I'm gonna download Episode One right away! I wish I could write a longer review, but this is it. If you somehow haven't played this game, you know what you must do.
Waiting patieltly for Half-Life 3
Waiting for HL3

Much of what is wrong with this game is similer to what I said about Half-life 1. The story is somewhat better, you can actualy knoqw whats happaning, but the game feels like you are running around shooting people and thats about it. It offers very little explenation why the Xen don't what to kill you anymore, I mean, you only attempted to commit genocide on them, but there ok with that. The game gives no reason why all the sudden the Humans can rise up against the Combine when the armies of man failed. It just makes no sense why the resistance, armed with small arms and rifles, can topple the combine when people with tanks, helicopters, and nukes could not. The story, while there, is very vauge and it does not help that you are incapable of speaking again. I am not trolling people with this, I actualy think this about the game and cannot understand why people rave about Half-life. This is just a mediocre shooter with some fun aspects like the gravity gun, but thats about were the fun stops. I have played the whole game and attepmted to learn some lore.

This is the best game ever. Every time I play this game my synapses stimulate my endorphins near the point of putting my body into a blissful coma of utter enjoyment. Just thinking of this game wells my eyes with a cloud of tears that I attempt to hold back to no avail. Lo... if only there was a Half-Life 3. I wake up at nights breathing heavily, panting in deep want, groaning in agony that the legends of a third in this series is yet another vaporware myth. If you are questioning whether to purchase this game then consider the possibility no further my friend. This game will absord your soul into a void of enlightenment, where you will find the true purpose of life... it is Half-Life.

I shouldn't have to point this out, but before there ever was a zombie apocalypse game... there was Half-Life 2. Zombie survival skills are a pre-requisite for this game.

The top 10 reasons why this game is better than any other game in the Universe.

1) Launching Garden Gnomes into Space
2) Gravity Gun
3) Zombies
4) Epic Storyline
5) Suspenseful Gameplay
6) Sweet Cut-scenes
7) Heart Warming Romance
8) Alien Nemesis
9) Mysterious G-Man
10) Controlling Giant Insects
11) I'll stop there since I could easily go on for infinity.

Play this game if you dare...

10/10

10년 전에 쥐포2마리 mx로 돌리다가 낮은 프레임에 화가 나서 이제야 플레이 했다.

다 깨지는 않았지만 8시간 정도면 겜 평가하는 시간으로는 충분하다고 본다.다들 시대의 명작 운운하지만 나에게는 왜이리 재미가 없었는지..

10년 전 게임이라 그런지 길 찾는 것이나 퍼즐의 진행 방식이 굉장히 불친절하다.게임을 진행하기 위해 필요한 오브젝트를 작동해야 한다는 암시를 주는 부분이 전혀 없다.(손잡이 부분을 하이라이트 시킨다든지..)그 덕에 그래픽 설정을 낮게 했다면 플레이 타임이 배로 늘어났을 것 같다.

이 게임이 10년 전에 나왔을 때는 물리 엔진가지고 말이 많았던 것 같은데나는 이 게임이 이리도 불친절한 이유가 그 엔진을 과시하기 위함이었다고 생각한다. 

이 게임은 나에게 있어 제작자가 우리 엔진 멋지지? 그렇지? 라는 물음에 그렇습니다라는 대답을 유도하기 위해 만든 딸딸이일 뿐이다. 2014년도의 게임은 이보다 사실적이며 이보다 친절하다. 모든 면에서 하프라이프보다 나은데도 겸손하다.

최신게임에 눈이 맞춰져 있는 지금의 게이머에게는 전혀 어필이 안되는 게임이다. 이는 마치 내가 전설의 명작이라던 파판6를 하다가 곧 지워버린 것과도 비슷한 것 같다.
Играл и ещё играю

I had the chance to play the game when it came out in 2004 and it was really amazing.
I just bought a PC recently, the first game that I have finished was this game and still, was a wonderful experience.

There is a superb variety with the environments, weapons and enemies. The graphics still looks good, I was really surprised for a 10 years old game. The quality of the sounds, songs and voices is great and helps for the immersion.
The physics was impressive back in the time and it is still fun to watch.

The only negative point could be that the AI was really most stronger in the first Half-Life. They was more tactic and not always running at you all the time.

If you have Steam and you never played the game, go get it! The quality of valve games is phenomenal. It works perfectly with win7,8,1!

This game is still great even 14 years later. I played and beat this game 3 or 4 years ago and reviewed it. The controls are crisp and the story is good. I had mentioned the graphics seemed to hold up well, but didn't really think about the graphics much beyond that.

I just got a new gaming laptop and decided to 100% complete the game. My recent completion drove me to remove my old review and update it based on my just finished experience.

Playing this game at max graphics and 1080 resolution blew my mind away. Even 14 years later at max settings this game still look freaking amazing. That combined with the story, controls and gameplay and I'm even more a fan of this game. The recent play through has encouraged me to pick up the Half Life 2 Episodes as play them as well
This game pretty much sets the bar for what I expect of story-based first-person shooters.

Это игра на десятилетия и вечно молода как дедушка Ленин. Современные дети-графодрочеры уже не поймут этот олдскул с примесью желтого и не уверуют в святую монтировку Фримена. С этой игрой я познакомился очень давно на тот момент она была очешуительна и не давно я снова к ней вернулся и скажу...она все так же очешуительна! Имхо, если вы рубали в этот бошкоснящий шутер вы зря прожили бренные годы своей жизни. Если жена достала или девушка бросила или начальник мудло-запусти Фримена и сбрось стресс убивая орды засранцев красненькой, но такой родной монтировкой. У меня все, играйте только в хорошее

Half-Life 2 is a classic that set itself apart from the rest of pc games near the end of 2004 when it was released. I've had the pleasure of diving back into the world of Gordon Freeman and I must say that it still holds up. For a game that has aged over ten years, the nostalgia is definetly inescapable. After pressing the "New Game" option, I was happily reinvited by the notorious, mysterious, and ethereal like G-Man who was only so happy to see my return aswell. At mine and Gordon Freeman's expense, we were allowed to rediscover the world of Half-Life where humanity has been enslaved by a super advanced race of extra terrestrials who entered our world through the means of teleportation that humanity had previously uncovered and prescipitated the resonance cascade event during Half-Life 1.

The graphics and detail are still appreciated and admired by this reviewer. Although dated, it's easy to understand why Gabe Newell (Half-Life's creator) was happy with his Source engine. Even today I can lose myself in well mapped areas and enemies that will stop at almost nothing to bring down the Freeman. The sounds of gunfire and explosion still hold an amazing level of quality, especially when you're in the midst of a firefight against Combine forces and the human/vortigaunt rebels who seek to take back their worlds from their oppressive overlords. The feeling of dropping enemies in their tracks with a shotgun or any of the others assortment of weapons is memorable and satifying. You truly feel like a force to be reckoned with.

Vehicles and other mountables are implemented very well into the world, and rarely do you find any issues with them. Sometimes you may find the occasional hiccup where your boat or buggy will hit some innocuous object in the ground or sticking out of wall, but it's negligible since it's so much darn fun. However, transitional maps can ruin that intense feeling of speed and chases with loading times that seem to come far too often. Half-Life 2 is a game from over a decade ago, so it's forgivable. Ai also does has it's ups and downs. At most times they can coordinate well and truely give you a formidable fight, but at other times they just seem so daft when they have issues navigating their way through a doorway or any other bottlenecked areas. It's funny to see enemies push through areas like the Stooges having a bad day sometimes.

Half-Life 2 holds itself together well in an age where games are being pushed out faster and faster through the factory belt. We can only hope for a sequel and give it many praises for being a foundation of many other successful games.

[h1]优点[/h1]
射击游戏的基础设定奠定者之一。
出色的剧本。
优秀的画面（以2004年而言）。

[h1]缺点[/h1]
部分关卡有严重的光影故障。（可通过添加启动参数解决）

[h1]打分[/h1]
[b]9/10[/b]（第一人称射击·近未来·动作）

[h1]评价[/h1]
不朽的经典《半条命》系列，它以及它的兄弟反恐精英是一个时代的开端。
我只说一句话：跪求数3。
